name: Pax Corpus
storyline: The game takes place in a cyberpunk sci-fi universe where the population is entirely made up of women; the men have all been killed, and the few survivors are mindless slaves. The reproduction of the population is ensured by the cloning technology of a powerful corporation, Alcyon, led by Kiyiana Soro. The player embodies a mercenary, Kahlee, who works for her own account. Kahlee comes to gradually unveil a dangerous project called Pax Corpus. Pax Corpus was created by Dr. Ellys on behalf of Kiyiana Soro. It is a terrible weapon which emits a radiation capable of taking away all freedom of thought from anyone exposed to it for too long; the people who are exposed to it are integrated into a collective entity subject to Alcyon. Kahlee must foil this plot, while maintaining a love-hate relationship with Kiyiana Soro.
summary:
Plunge into the strange world of Oz Nama alongside Kahlee, a dangerously seductive mercenary. Load your Blaster, warm up your joints and set off for an adventure to solve the mystery of the Pax Corpus. If you resist the charms and trickery of Kylana Soro, you may be able to help Kahlee to free Oz Nama from this dreadful creation.

Initially intended to be an adaptation of MTV's animated series Æon Flux, Cryo Interactive continued development on the game after Viacom, MTV's parent company, closed their video game division, removing any character names and references to the aforementioned series in the process.
